3. Waller City Council

Waller City Council
===================

**For a pleasant "Welcome to our City," please call us or drop by City Hall!**

Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need assistance with floodplain information, utility billing questions, vehicle licensing, heavy trash pickup, or any other City service. City staff members will work diligently to meet or exceed your expectations.







![Mayor Marburger 2026](https://www.wallertexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=1806)
